alert.note: Alert for Lyon (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 02 at 11:41PM CDT until August 03 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Lyon County in northwestern Iowa... Minnehaha County in southeastern South Dakota... Northwestern Lincoln County in southeastern South Dakota... * Until 1215 AM CDT. * At 1141 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ellis, or near Sioux Falls, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Sioux Falls around 1145 PM CDT. Harrisburg, Crooks and Renner around 1150 PM CDT. Baltic around 1155 PM CDT. Brandon, Corson and Rowena around 1200 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Palisades State Park, Garretson and Valley Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
